tool.name: OptDoE Parts Reference Generator
tool.description: Generate the genetic parts reference CSV file compatible with OptDoE
tool.help:
OptDoE Parts Reference Generator ==================================
This tool generates a CSV file that contains a list of links to the DNA registry SynBioHub for the desired vector backbones, resistance cassette, and promoters. Generate the genetic parts reference CSV file compatible with OptDoE.
NOTE: If left empty, the default is the following:
+---------+------------+--------------------------------------------------+ | Name | Type | SynBioHub | +=========+============+==================================================+ | PlacUV5 | Promoter | https://synbiohub.org/public/igem/BBa_K1847014/1 | +---------+------------+--------------------------------------------------+ | Ptrc | Promoter | https://synbiohub.org/public/igem/BBa_J56012/1 | +---------+------------+--------------------------------------------------+ | BBR1 | Origin | https://synbiohub.org/public/igem/BBa_I50041/1 | +---------+------------+--------------------------------------------------+ | p15A | Origin | https://synbiohub.org/public/igem/BBa_I50032/1 | +---------+------------+--------------------------------------------------+ | ColE1 | Origin | https://synbiohub.org/public/igem/BBa_J64101/1 | +---------+------------+--------------------------------------------------+ | res1 | Resistance | https://synbiohub.org/public/igem/BBa_I13800/1 | +---------+------------+--------------------------------------------------+ | Ter | Terminator | https://synbiohub.org/public/igem/BBa_B1006/1 | +---------+------------+--------------------------------------------------+
Input -----
Required:
* **-name**\ : (string) Name of the genetic part * **-type**\ : (string) Type of genetic part (valid options: promoter, origin, resitance) * **-synnbiohub**\ : (string) URL to the SynBioHub entry of that part
Output ------
* **-output**\ : (string) Path to the output CSV file
